channel.title: Making someone donator through logs
channel.description:
Hello Guys, please help me with this problem here. I have got a server and it has donator feature hence to make a player donator, I would need to go to the character file and change something like donator = 0 to donator = 1.
I would want the server to read the donator status base on the log file "donator" which is already in the folder logs. Meaning I would just need to type the name into the file and he would be a donator instead of me changing the character file.
Thank You/

item.title: Making someone donator through logs
item.dc:creator: @ngjunda ngjunda
item.description:
@ngjunda wrote:

Yeah, mine have donator logs, but it wont work even if i tried typing it to the logs “donators.txt” I guess it’s not link together with the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Making someone donator through logs
item.dc:creator: @Zhawa Zhawa
item.description:
@Zhawa wrote:

Most deltas have Donator logs? Config>Donators.txt

If you dont i will rip the donator log system for you

Read full topic

item.title: Making someone donator through logs
item.dc:creator: @ngjunda ngjunda
item.description:
@ngjunda wrote:

[quote=“Zhawa, post:3, topic:374753”][quote author=Untamed Soul link=topic=470717.msg3442287#msg3442287 date=1293153900]

Hello Guys, please help me with this problem here. I have got a server and it has donator feature hence to make a player donator, I would need to go to the character file and change something like donator = 0 to donator = 1.

I would want the server to read the donator status base on the log file “donator” which is already in the folder logs. Meaning I would just need to type the name into the file and he would be a donator instead of me changing the character file.

Thank You/
[/quote]Want Me To Just Get You A Command?

That is not what he asked for retard

@OP What base? Delta, PI?[/quote]

Yeah, I think you got what you mean. I am not so good at phrasing sentences.
Server base is: Delta

Thank you.

Read full topic
